aagama dahamata nambauruwima, sharirika wyayama, mana poshanayak sahitha samabara aahara welak ganima, elawalu, palathuru saha pala warga wadipura aaharayata ekathu kara ganima, pirisidu jalaya wadipura panaya kirima, gewathu wagawa, saundaryathmaka windanaya wani wiwidha kriyawan dainika jiwithayata ek kara ganimin pirisiduwa piliwelakata winodayen diwi gewima saha anawashya karyabahula bawin midi sahallu diwi pewathak gatha kirimen menma ahithakara srunathmaka aakalpawalin thora sithuwili malawak godananga ganima thulin manasika aathathiye pidanayen midi nirogimath ha thrupthimath jiwithayak gatha kirimata haki wanu atha.
